Class CategoryBusiness

  • java.lang.Object

public class CategoryBusiness
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for all activities with neo4j database regarding the entity Category

    drago

      • getAllCategories

        public java.util.List<Category> getAllCategories()
        method which queries all the categories from the neo4j database
        Returns:
        a list of all categories found in the neo4j database

      • createCategory

        public java.lang.Long createCategory(Category category)
        method which checks the name of the given category and returns 0L if the name already exists, otherwise it creates a given category object in the neo4j database
        Parameters:
        category - is the given category object to create
        Returns:
        the neo4j ID of the created category

      • getNameList

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getNameList()
        method which creates a name list of all categories in the neo4j database
        Returns:
        a list of all names as strings

      • updateCategory

        public Category updateCategory(java.lang.String categoryId,
                               Category cat)
        method which updates a certain category in the neo4j database with the content of the given category object
        Parameters:
        categoryId - is the ID of the category to be updated; can be the neo4j ID or the unique name
        cat - is the category object with the new content
        Returns:
        the updated category

      • deleteCategory

        public void deleteCategory(java.lang.String categoryId)
        method which deletes a certain category in the neo4j database
        Parameters:
        categoryId - is the ID of the category to be deleted; can be the neo4j ID or the unique name
